page.title: 12 THE SCENIC ROUTE
page.content: There are about five lakes altogether.They are all small lakes.One of the lakes looks like a boot. One of the lakes is used for canoeing.People come canoeing during the weekends. The{Scenic Route}runs past the{Oak {Loughs}high up in the hills to the South of Gortin.From it the visitor has a panoramic view across the valley. On Sundays people come and have pinics and admire the view.The Scenic Route is beside the shooting range. A Caravan Park and a History Park are being provided in the nearby {Gortin Glen}Forest Park.
